privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy | openaisoras.com
privacyPolicy.mainDescription: Discover an innovative collection of videos powered by OpenAI's Sora model. We've curated a selection of videos created with Sora AI by users across the web, bringing you the charm of AI art.
privacyPolicy.desc: Thank you for choosing OpenAISoras! This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website located at
privacyPolicy.h4_1_pa: a. Personal Data: When you use OpenAISoras, we may collect your name, email address, and payment information for order processing purposes.
privacyPolicy.h4_1_pb: b. Non-Personal Data: We may also collect non-personal data through web cookies to enhance your browsing experience.
privacyPolicy.h4_2_p: We collect your personal data solely for order processing purposes.
privacyPolicy.h4_3_p: We do not share your personal data with any third parties.
privacyPolicy.h4_4_p: OpenAISoras does not knowingly collect any personal data from children.
privacyPolicy.h4_5_p: We will notify users of any updates to this Privacy Policy via email.
privacyPolicy.h4_6_p: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us at

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service | openaisoras.com
termsOfService.mainDescription: Discover an innovative collection of videos powered by OpenAI's Sora model. We've curated a selection of videos created with Sora AI by users across the web, bringing you the charm of AI art.
termsOfService.desc: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of OpenAISoras (the "Service"), provided by OpenAISoras ("we" or "us"). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
termsOfService.h4_1_p: Discover an innovative collection of videos powered by OpenAI's Sora model. We've curated a selection of videos created with Sora AI by users across the web, bringing you the charm of AI art.
termsOfService.h4_2_p: The ownership of the video generated from the text belongs to the original user.
termsOfService.h4_3_p: We collect and store user data including name, email, and payment information. We handle this data in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
termsOfService.h4_4_p: We use web cookies to collect non-personal data. For more information, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
termsOfService.h4_5_p: Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information about you. By using our Service, you agree to our Privacy Policy, which can be found at
termsOfService.h4_6_p: These Terms are governed by the laws of the United States of America.
termsOfService.h4_7_p: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify users of any material changes via email.
termsOfService.h4_8_p: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us at

indexQuestion.h2_1_p1: OpenAI's Sora model is an advanced AI designed to convert text into video.
indexQuestion.h2_1_p2: It generates realistic and imaginative scenes based on text descriptions, creating multiple characters and accurately simulating specific motions and scene details.
indexQuestion.h2_1_p3: Impressive in language understanding and video production, Sora offers creative professionals a new tool for innovation.
indexQuestion.h2_1_p4: For more detailed information, visit OpenAI's official website
indexQuestion.h2_2_p1: Discover an innovative collection of videos powered by OpenAI's Sora model. We've curated a selection of videos created with Sora AI by users across the web, bringing you the charm of AI art.
indexQuestion.h2_2_p2: It simplifies the video creation process, allowing for easy deployment and use.
indexQuestion.h2_2_p3: With OpenAISoras, anyone can create videos by simply inputting text, making it an accessible tool for both professionals and enthusiasts in video production and AI technology.
indexQuestion.h2_2_p4a: For more information, you can visit the OpenAISoras website

worksPage.pDescription: Discover an innovative collection of videos powered by OpenAI's Sora model. We've curated a selection of videos created with Sora AI by users across the web, bringing you the charm of AI art. OpenAISoras allows users to generate videos online from text. This is done using OpenAI's Sora model, simplifying video creation.
